languages.text: Археотек-устройство, искаженное дерзкой рукой техножреца, излишне привязанного к союзникам-мирянам. Желая дать им дополнительную защиту в перестрелках, он совершил глубоко осуждаемый Адептус Механикус эксперимент, вскоре после чего был предан, а его творение — продано пиратам.

An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.
languages.original_text: Археотек-устройство, искаженное дерзкой рукой техножреца, излишне привязанного к союзникам-мирянам. Желая дать им дополнительную защиту в перестрелках, он совершил глубоко осуждаемый Адептус Механикус эксперимент, вскоре после чего был предан, а его творение — продано пиратам.

Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

languages.text: Un dispositivo arqueotecnológico adulterado por las manos insensatas de un tecnosacerdote excesivamente leal a sus aliados laicos. Con intención de proporcionarles protección en combate, realizó un experimento considerado herético por el Adeptus Mechanicus, tras lo cual fue traicionado y su creación se vendió a un grupo de piratas.
languages.original_text: An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

traits.locale_text: Un dispositivo arqueotecnológico adulterado por las manos insensatas de un tecnosacerdote excesivamente leal a sus aliados laicos. Con intención de proporcionarles protección en combate, realizó un experimento considerado herético por el Adeptus Mechanicus, tras lo cual fue traicionado y su creación se vendió a un grupo de piratas.

languages.text: 盟友を溺愛する技術司祭の愚かな手によって歪められた技術遺産のデバイス。小競り合いの中での保護を強化するべく帝国技術局から非難を浴びるような実験を行ったものの、直後に裏切られ、海賊に売られてしまった。
languages.original_text: An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

traits.locale_text: 盟友を溺愛する技術司祭の愚かな手によって歪められた技術遺産のデバイス。小競り合いの中での保護を強化するべく帝国技術局から非難を浴びるような実験を行ったものの、直後に裏切られ、海賊に売られてしまった。

languages.text: 这件远古科技遭到了某位技术神甫不计后果的改造。那位技术神甫过于热切地想要保护他的同伴，希望能在小规模战斗中为他的战友提供额外保护，于是便用这件远古科技造物进行了一场实验，但最终却遭到了机械修会的严厉谴责。不久之后，他就遭到了背叛，他的造物也被卖给了海盗。
languages.original_text: An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

traits.locale_text: 这件远古科技遭到了某位技术神甫不计后果的改造。那位技术神甫过于热切地想要保护他的同伴，希望能在小规模战斗中为他的战友提供额外保护，于是便用这件远古科技造物进行了一场实验，但最终却遭到了机械修会的严厉谴责。不久之后，他就遭到了背叛，他的造物也被卖给了海盗。

languages.text: Ein Archäotech-Gerät, von der fahrlässigen Hand eines Techpriesters entstellt, der seinen weltlichen Verbündeten zu sehr ergeben war. Um ihnen im Kampf zusätzlichen Schutz zu bieten, führte er ein Experiment aus, das vom Adeptus Mechanicus scharf verurteilt wurde. Bald darauf wurde er verraten und seine Schöpfung wurde an die Piraten verkauft.
languages.original_text: An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

traits.locale_text: Ein Archäotech-Gerät, von der fahrlässigen Hand eines Techpriesters entstellt, der seinen weltlichen Verbündeten zu sehr ergeben war. Um ihnen im Kampf zusätzlichen Schutz zu bieten, führte er ein Experiment aus, das vom Adeptus Mechanicus scharf verurteilt wurde. Bald darauf wurde er verraten und seine Schöpfung wurde an die Piraten verkauft.

languages.text: Dispositif archéotechnologique perverti par la main d'un technoprêtre par trop dévoué à ses alliés profanes. Désireux de leur conférer une protection supplémentaire au combat, il s'est livré à une expérience formellement réprouvée par l'Adeptus Mechanicus avant d'être trahi et de voir sa création revendue à des pirates.
languages.original_text: An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

traits.locale_text: Dispositif archéotechnologique perverti par la main d'un technoprêtre par trop dévoué à ses alliés profanes. Désireux de leur conférer une protection supplémentaire au combat, il s'est livré à une expérience formellement réprouvée par l'Adeptus Mechanicus avant d'être trahi et de voir sa création revendue à des pirates.

languages.text: Alaylı müttefiklerine kendini son derece adamış bir Tekno Rahip'in dikkatsizlik eseri bozduğu bir arkeotek cihazı. Çatışmalarda onlara daha fazla koruma sağlama isteğiyle Adeptus Mechanicus tarafından son derece kınanan bir deney gerçekleştirmiş. Kısa süre sonra ihanete uğrayarak icadını korsanlara satmış.
languages.original_text: An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.
